name: Uncharted Planet
description:
Uncharted Planet

Jonas Quinn, hired private investigator for the Romano family, finds himself tasked with tracking down a sibling gone missing on a newly discovered planet far from the safety of the core systems. Quinn must search for the whereabouts ... or remains of David Romano by finding his data logs left behind in the wake of the crash.

Features
  • 3D forest landscape
  • Alien flora and fauna
  • Updating HUD
  • Directional Compass
  • Six missing logs
